title: is there a scam in lol?
body:
Over the past few days I've had 3-4 people email me a link like this one **LINK REDACTED** 

I haven't clicked it as they have all come from people I don't really play with regularly or know. Being the super suspicious person that I am, I figure that its some sort of scam as I cant see why there would be any league of legends give away's that would come from a domain other than leaugeoflegends.com.

Are other people being spammed with stuff like this? 
and has anyone actually gone through and clicked the link?
Is it legitimate? or just a scam like I'm presuming it is?

If it is a scam, is there anything that Riot can do about it, or is it just one of those things that there is no way to block people from spamming stuff because as soon as you block one thing from being spammed 6 others pop up to take its place.

replies.body:
I was kicked from about 6 teambuilder lobbies yesterday because I called them out on this being total bull%%%%.

It turns out their plan was never to play, but to just have a constant lobby where they farmed people to click on their link.
thanks Veiled, I thought as much.

Although I have never clicked on these links, I can tell you it is not a giveaway of any kind, it is either a scam to steal your account details/credit card number/anything else they want, or it is a website where the referrer gets paid by the amount of people they get to visit the site.
it is legit, i got 10k rp from it
